items: Never have I ever re-gifted a present.
Never have I ever eaten an entire batch of cookie dough.
Never have I ever spilled something sparkly on myself.
Never have I ever peeked at a gift early.
Never have I ever forgotten someone's gift until the last minute.
Never have I ever fallen asleep watching a holiday movie.
Never have I ever broken an ornament.
Never have I ever burned something while trying to bake.
Never have I ever pretended to enjoy a Secret Santa gift.
Never have I ever eaten dessert for breakfast.
Never have I ever wrapped a gift so poorly it became a joke.
Never have I ever received a gift that made me genuinely confused.
Never have I ever panic-bought a gift at a gas station or drugstore.
Never have I ever worn an ugly sweater on purpose.
Never have I ever gotten a random Teams call from Madhu
Never have I ever worked on a major holiday.
Never have I ever binged an entire TV show series during a holiday break.
Never have I ever tried a traditional holiday meal from another country.
Never have I ever had a sword fight with a wrapping paper tube
Never have I ever RSVP'd 'maybe' to a holiday party when I already knew I wasn't going
Never have I ever dramatically complained about the cold while refusing to wear a real coat
Never have I ever pretended my WI-FI was breaking up just to leave a meeting early.
Never have I ever worn pajamas on the bottom and a professional top on a Teams call.
Never have I ever accidentally talked on mute for a solid 10 seconds.
Never have I ever forgotten I had my camera on while doing something harmless but unprofessional.
